[++Fossil excavation++]

[Infinite time]
4FFFED58 14000000
3FFFED58 15000000
BFFFED58 00000000
400000C8 41200000
000000C8 42C70000
D2000000 00000000
{Dig as long as you like. Picks can break this code.}

[Ignore [most] damage]
4FFFED58 14000000
3FFFED58 15000000
BFFFED58 00000000
8000031C 00000000
1000031C 00000000
D2000000 00000000
{Can't prevent damage from the final hit. Picks can break this code.May cause crashes if on during tournaments.}

[Fully excavated (R)]
4FFFED58 14000000
3FFFED58 15000000
BFFFED58 00000000
DD000000 00000100
00000324 0000FFFF
D2000000 00000000
{Doesnt remove damage. Use if rogue vivosaur gets too close. Picks might break this code.}

[--]
